berger.author: Berger, E. D., Hollenbeck, C., Maj, P., Vitek, O., & Vitek, J.
berger.description: Dataset of labeled commits from Berger, E. D., Hollenbeck, C., Maj, P., Vitek, O., & Vitek, J. (2019). On the impact of programming languages on code quality: a reproduction study. ACM Transactions on Programming Languages and Systems (TOPLAS), 41(4), 1-24.

herzig.author: K Herzig, S Just, A Zeller
herzig.description: Dataset of manually classified bug reports from K Herzig, S Just, A Zeller It's not a bug, it's a feature: how misclassification impacts bug prediction with linked commits recovered by giganticode

1151-commits.author: Levin, S., Yehudai, A.
1151-commits.description: Dataset of manually-labeled 1k commits (corrective, perfective, adaptive) from Levin, S., & Yehudai, A. (2017, November). Boosting automatic commit classification into maintenance activities by utilizing source code changes. In Proceedings of the 13th International Conference on Predictive Models and Data Analytics in Software Engineering (pp. 97-106).

200k-commits.author: JA. Prenner
200k-commits.description:
Dataset of commits mined by JA. Prenner from Github.
 Cite: @inproceedings{babii2021mining,
  title={Mining Software Repositories with a Collaborative Heuristic Repository},
  author={Babii, Hlib and Prenner, Julian Aron and Stricker, Laurin and Karmakar, Anjan and Janes, Andrea and Robbes, Romain},
  booktitle={2021 IEEE/ACM 43rd International Conference on Software Engineering: New Ideas and Emerging Results (ICSE-NIER)},
  pages={106--110},
  year={2021},
  organization={IEEE}
}. License: Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International

200k-commits-issues.author: JA. Prenner
200k-commits-issues.description: 200k-commit dataset: linked issues. License: Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International

200k-commits-files.author: JA. Prenner
200k-commits-files.description: 200k-commit dataset: linked files. License: Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International

200k-commits-link-issues.author: JA. Prenner
200k-commits-link-issues.description: Dataset of links between 200k-commits and 200-commits issues. License: Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International

200k-commits-manual-labels.author: All contributors: H. Babii
200k-commits-manual-labels.description: Manual labels for the 200k-commits dataset. License: Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International

smells-train.author: Madeyski, Lech, Lewowski, Tomasz
smells-train.description: Dataset from Madeyski, Lech, and Tomasz Lewowski. "MLCQ: Industry-relevant code smell data set." preprocessed by H. Babii to extract long method smells and split into train and test sets. License: Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International

developer-labeled-commits.author: Andreas Mauczka, Florian Brosch, Christian Schanes, Thomas Grechenig

fine-grained-refactorings.author: Krasniqi, Rrezarta; Cleland-Huang, Jane
fine-grained-refactorings.description: dataset of manually-labeled fine-grained refactoring types from Enhancing Code Refactoring Detection with Explanations from Commit Messages

smells-test.author: Madeyski, Lech, Lewowski, Tomasz
smells-test.description: Dataset from Madeyski, Lech, and Tomasz Lewowski. "MLCQ: Industry-relevant code smell data set." preprocessed by H. Babii to extract long method smells and split into train and test sets. License: Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International
